snippet: From souped-up sedans to slick, high-performance sports cars, automakers are showing off their fastest models in this year’s auto show.
abstract: Car makers are rolling out high-performance sports cars and souped-up sedans at the North American International Auto Show; trend marks stark departure from years past in which manufacturers focused on practical models in midst of recession.
lead_paragraph: From souped-up sedans to slick, high-performance sports cars, automakers are showing off their fastest models in this year’s auto show.

headline.main: Glory Days of High-Powered Muscle Cars Are Back at Detroit Auto Show
headline.print_headline: Glory Days of High-Powered Muscle Cars Are Back at Detroit Auto Show
